parsing_result:
# Connections | Problem | Solution | |---------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **The monitor is blank.** | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (📖 272). | | **Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.** | EYE SENSOR is selected for VIEW MODE SETTING > PLAYBACK: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different VIEW MODE SETTING option (📖 207). | | **No picture or sound on TV.** | - The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (📖 272).
- Input on the television is set to “TV”: Set input to “HDMI” (📖 272).
- The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (📖 272). | | **The computer does not recognize the camera.** | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (📖 277). | | **FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.** | Check the option selected for PC CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable (📖 284). | | **Cannot connect to iPhones or iPads.** | ON is selected for USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING. Select OFF when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that does not supply power (📖 240). | | **Cannot connect to smartphone.** | Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connector with which the smartphone is equipped (📖 281). |
